title: Friday's big stock stories: What's likely to move the market in the next trading session
summary: CNBC's Stocks @ Night is delivered after hours, giving you a first look at tomorrow and last look at today. Sign up for free to receive it directly in your inbox. Here's what CNBC's producers were watching as stocks slid on Thursday.

title: ROSEN, A GLOBALLY RESPECTED LAW FIRM, Encourages GitLab Inc. Investors to Secure Counsel Before Important Deadline in Securities Class Action - GTLB - GitLab  ( NASDAQ:GTLB )
summary: Rosen Law Firm reminds purchasers of securities of GitLab Inc. GTLB of the important November 4, 2024 lead plaintiff deadline. If you purchased GitLab securities during the Class Period you may be entitled to compensation without payment of any out of pocket fees or costs. A class action lawsuit has already been filed.

If you purchased Verve Therapeutics securities during the Class Period you may be entitled to compensation without payment of any out of pocket fees or costs. A class action lawsuit has already been filed.

title: Cannabis Giant Green Thumb To Report Q3 Results, Here's What Investors Should Watch For - Green Thumb Industries  ( OTC:GTBIF )
summary: Cannabis consumer packaged goods company Green Thumb Industries Inc. will release its third quarter 2024 financial results after the market closes on Nov.7, 2024. A conference call and audio webcast will be held on the same day at 5:00 pm ET to discuss the results and answer questions.

title: Why Magnite Stock Was Sinking at Double-Digit Rates This Week
summary: Walt Disney no longer uses adtech company Magnite. Magnite's stock price was down by nearly 11% week to date as of early Thursday evening. The company should offer some explanation or clarity to get ahead of the situation.

title: NY Cannabis Market Soars To $654M But Equity Licensees Are Left Behind, Report Finds - Curaleaf Holdings  ( OTC:CURLF )
summary: New York’s legal cannabis market reached a record $97.4 million in sales in August. The state's regulators are actively cracking down on illegal cannabis operations. Despite these successes, the report acknowledges that significant work remains to be done.

title: Visa Inc. ANNOUNCEMENT: If You Have Suffered Losses in Visa Inc.  ( NYSE: V ) , You Are Encouraged to Contact The Rosen Law Firm About Your Rights - Visa  ( NYSE:V )
summary: The Rosen Law Firm is preparing a class action seeking recovery of investor losses. If you purchased Visa securities, you may be entitled to compensation without payment of any out of pocket fees or costs. To join the prospective class action, go to https://rosenlegal.com/submit-form/?case_id=29131.

title: NuLegacy Gold terminates Private Placement
summary: NuLegacy Gold Corporation is focused on exploring exploring high-grade gold deposits in Nevada. The Company issued 45,200,000 units (“Units”) at a price of $0.01 per Unit for gross proceeds of $452,000. 40,000,000 Units were purchased by Crescat Portfolio Management LLC (‘Crescat’) together with various directors and officers of the Company for a total of $400,000 (the “Offering”). The net proceeds of the Offering have been used/allocated to pay the annual BLM and county filing fees.

title: Chronic Pain Patients Support Cannabis Access Expansion While Physicians Favor Restrictions, Study Finds
summary: Those suffering from chronic pain are more in favor of policies that expand cannabis access compared to the physicians who provide their care. The majority of chronic pain patients said they would like insurance cover cannabis treatment for their condition.

title: Fidelity International: fund sales surged on interest rate cuts, China rally
summary: Hong Kong-based Charlotte Chan says sales of retail funds in Hong Kong doubled from a year earlier. “We have seen many of them have shifted from cash to investing in long-term bonds,” she said.

title: Port Strike Ends, Workers In A Tentative Deal Return To Work Friday [Updated]
summary: The recent port strike on the East and Gulf coasts ended following a tentative agreement between dockworkers and port operators. The agreement includes a substantial wage increase and improved working conditions. The quick settlement also defused a political risk for the current administration.

title: Arkansas Court Orders Medical Marijuana Ballot Signature Count
summary: Arkansas Supreme Court orders Secretary of State to count 18,000 disputed signatures. Issue 3, a proposed amendment to expand the state’s medical marijuana program, fell 2,664 signatures short of the amount needed to qualify for the November ballot. The court set a deadline of Friday for Thurston to file a report on the verification process.

title: SIGA Technologies  ( SIGA )  Shares Tumble After Mpox Therapy Fails, Chief Medical Officer Terminated - Hagens Berman - SIGA Technologies  ( NASDAQ:SIGA )
summary: Biopharmaceutical company SIGA Technologies is under intense scrutiny over its prior disclosures. The inquiry centers on the company's statements about the likelihood of securing FDA approval to broaden the drug's label. SIGA investors who suffered substantial losses to submit your losses now.

A class action lawsuit has already been filed. If you wish to serve as lead plaintiff, you must move the Court no later than October28, 2024. The Rosen Law Firm represents investors throughout the globe.

title: DSV, 1137 - DSV A/S COMPLETES EQUITY OFFERING OF 26.4 MILLION NEW SHARES RAISING GROSS PROCEEDS OF DKK 37.3 BILLION  ( APPROX. EUR 5 BILLION )
summary: DSV A/S announces completion of equity offering and directed issue of new shares raising gross proceeds of DKK 37.3 billion (approx. EUR 5 billion) The offer price is DKK 1,410.50 per share. The New Shares represent approximately 12.4% of DSV’s registered share capital before the capital increase.

title: Missouri judge blocks Biden student loan forgiveness that was cleared to proceed
summary: The Biden administration's sweeping student loan forgiveness plan was temporarily blocked again Thursday by a Missouri judge. The latest order capped 24 hours during which federal student loan holders were subjected to judicial whiplash. A lawsuit challenging Biden's aid package, brought by seven GOP-led states, bounced from Georgia to Missouri courts.

title: 79North Announces Shares for Debt Transaction
summary: 79North Inc. (CSE: JQ) announces that it has entered into a series of debt settlement agreements (the “Settlement Agreements”) for the issuance of 1,572,822 common shares in the capital of the Company. The Shares for Debt Settlement are expected to be issued at a deemed price of $0.10 per Share. Closing of the Shares for debt Settlement is anticipated to take place on or about October 10, 2024.

title: No, a CryptoPunks NFT Didn't Just Sell for $56 Million
summary: CryptoPunk 1563 was last purchased for about $69,000 worth of ETH in September. On-chain data shows that the purchase was conducted via crafty use of flash loans. The flash loan is apparently tied to an upcoming meme coin called "Kamala Harris Punk"

title: Teamsters Added 50,000 New Members In 3Y Cannabis Related - Cresco Labs  ( OTC:CRLBF ) , Ascend Wellness Holdings  ( OTC:AAWH )
summary: The International Brotherhood of Teamsters has added 50,000 new members in just two and a half years. Part of this growth stems from the Teamsters' organizing efforts within the booming cannabis sector. Last year the union achieved a significant presence across the entire cannabis supply chain.

title: Why Futu Holdings Stock Was on Fire This Week
summary: Futu Holdings (FUTU -0.02%) shares were up by a very impressive 43% week to date. JPMorgan Chase's Katherine Lei nearly doubled said Futu price target. The rally seemed to be fizzling on Thursday because of profit-taking.
